    • getPoints

      @GetMapping("/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PointsResponse> getPoints()
      Get user's current points

    • addPoints

      @PostMapping("/me/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PointsResponse> addPoints(@RequestParam int points)
      Add points to a user

    • redeemPoints

      @PostMapping("/me/redeem") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PointsResponse> redeemPoints(@RequestParam int points)
      Redeem generic points (no specific reward)

    • getAllRewards

      @GetMapping("/catalog") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Reward>> getAllRewards()
      Get list of all available rewards

    • addReward

      @PostMapping("/catalog/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Reward> addReward(@RequestBody Reward reward)
      Add a new reward (for admin/demo seeding)

    • redeemReward

      @PostMapping("/me/redeem-reward/{rewardId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RewardResponse> redeemReward(@PathVariable Long rewardId)
      Redeem a specific reward (deduct points accordingly)
